text:
="preserve">Colin Campbell McDonald (17 November 1928 – 11 January 2021) was an Australian cricketer. He played in 47 Test matches for his country from 1952 to 1961. He also played in 192 first-class matches between 1947 and 1963. McDonald was born in Glen Iris, Victoria.
McDonald died in Melbourne, Victoria, on 11 January 2021. He was 92.
